thread.title: STEVEN
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by STEVEN

author: STEVEN
title: STEVEN
text: Picked up from the Airport. The ladies at the counter were very helpful and answered all our questions. We are quite wary when it comes to hiring cars from all the stories you read and hear. They explained any damages and size of scratches that are acceptable from everyday wear and tear. When we got to our car there were a few minor scratches and dents but the man who looks after the cars in the carpark explained that they were within their limits and therefor not marked on the paperwork. The car was clean and reliable and we were most satisfied with RedSpot.
